jjil.j2se.ocr
Class Gray8FindTextBlock

java.lang.Object
  jjil.j2se.ocr.Gray8FindTextBlock

public class Gray8FindTextBlock
extends java.lang.Object

Given a binary image, search for the largest likely text block. The text block is assumed to consist of non Byte.MIN_VALUE-pixels which are overlap when projected along the horizontal axis and which are more than 1/2 the maximum character height when projected along the vertical axis.
